data_meta.category: 해외여행 공항 보안 검색대 요원과 승객

sentences.speaker: John
sentences.sentence: Could you please remove your belt, ma'am?

sentences.speaker: Sarah
sentences.sentence: Sure, just give me a moment.

sentences.speaker: John
sentences.sentence: Don't forget to collect your belongings after the scan.

sentences.speaker: Sarah
sentences.sentence: No problem, and thank you for guiding me through the process.

sentences.speaker: John
sentences.sentence: It's my job, ma'am. Have a safe flight!

sentences.speaker: Sarah
sentences.sentence: Thank you, have a great day too!

expressions.desc: 보안 요원인 John이 보안 검색을 통과한 Sarah에게 이 말을 합니다.
expressions.example_en: Thank you for your help at the check-in counter. Have a safe flight!
expressions.example_ko: 체크인 카운터에서의 도움에 감사드립니다. 안전한 비행 되세요!

sentences.sentence: 문제 없어요, 절차를 안내해 주셔서 감사해요.
제 일이니까요, 부인. 안전한 비행 되세요!
